name: Spooky Bounce
description:
Spooky Bounce lets you adventure through a ghostly world and bounce your way to glory and high scores. Easy to learn controls get you bouncing in no time in over 100 increasingly challenging levels. Can you beat the best score on each level?

Features:
- Over 100 levels of bouncing
- Simple controls with skilled platforming
- A ranked level to compete against other players for the high score
- Challenging achievements
- Multiple obstacles to interact with
- Stat tracking and competitive leaderboards
- Haunted Menus
- Ghosts

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/bootjetgames/

Thank you for bouncing!!!
